News

All the latest and greatest

BROOM Taped Out

August 20, 2018

BROOM, a resilient low-voltage operation version of BOOM in 28nm CMOS was taped out and presented at HotChips 2018!

BOOM in FireSim

August 19, 2018

FireSim, an open-source cycle-accurate, FPGA-accelerated scale-out computer system simulation platform, now supports BOOM designs as a target! Check it out at fires.im.

More to come

We will add here when new milestones and features have been added!
